The Qur’an, if the publication, is a group of people as a group of people, which is the camel in which the day came from the day in which the tenth of the tenth is sent, and then it is still the name It is said that after what it also puts, and it is the same thing that is for its people and the most dearest to them, it is a disturbance that is left, and it is not a shepherd, and it is not for it.Al -Halb and Al -Sarra, and it was said: On the sake of the states; And that is if the resurrection of the resurrection of the resurrection of its people is what they dreamed of what is if it is.It was said: This desecration on the day of resurrection, so al -Qaribbi said: The words are on the verge, as there is no publicity at that time, and the meaning is that if it was a tenth, they would not be humiliated.With themselves, and it was said about the truth; That is, if they rose from the graves and witnessed the wives, the dawn, and the animals are stuffed and they saw their shadows, which were the opponents of their money in them, and they did not love it, and they would not be tired of it.As you see.It was said: What is meant by the clouds of the clouds is similar to the closed clouds, which is the same as the one who is close to the one who has a lump, and in which there is a luxurious, with a gentle, with the pleasure of the goodness with the pleasure of the other And between what he accepted; The clouds are complicated by the heads of the mountains, and you see it and that it does not contradict it as a suitable time for what is after it on the first And it gives it a metaphor for the abuse of its rain because they are in a job.It was said about the annex of its rain, and it was said: It is the homes that are delayed, so do not dwell, and it was said: The land that is tasty is the urbanization of its urbanization, so it is not planted.And Al -Yazidi's harmful read: “I was disrupted” by lightness and construction for the face, and he transferred it in the condominiums of Ibn Katheer and then he said: He is an illusion, but “I will be disturbed” I was disrupted; Because you tighten it to the aggression, it is said: I disrupted the thing and disrupted it, so it was disrupted by itself, and the woman was disrupted, so it is unemployed, if it is not for it, so it is not necessary A language in which I did, and I did it; That is, in the transgression, and it was said: The appearance is that it is enemy with the letters, then he was deleted and the verb was connected to itself.
